com.facebook.buck.util.concurrent

Interface WorkThreadTrackingFuture<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Future<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WorkThreadTrackingFutureDecorator

    public interface WorkThreadTrackingFuture<T>
extends Future<T>
    A Future which keeps track of the thread running its computation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  WorkThreadTrackingFuture.RecursiveGetException 
      static interface  WorkThreadTrackingFuture.WorkThreadTracker
      Tracker to notify the future when computation has started and finished.

      • isBeingWorkedOnByCurrentThread

        boolean isBeingWorkedOnByCurrentThread()
        Returns whether the future is being computed by the current thread.

      • completedFuture

        static <T> WorkThreadTrackingFuture<T> completedFuture(T value)
        Returns an instance already completed with the given value.

      • create

        static <T,FUTURE extends Future<T>> WorkThreadTrackingFutureDecorator<T,FUTURE> create(Function<WorkThreadTrackingFuture.WorkThreadTracker,FUTURE> futureFactory)
        Returns a WorkThreadTrackingFuture that adds work tracking to another future.

        The factory function should use the passed in WorkTracker to notify this instance when the work has started and finished. For example, to decorate a CompletableFuture: 

        
 WorkThreadTrackingFuture.create(workTracker -> CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
   try (Scope scope = workTracker.start()) {
     return doWork();
   }
 }));
